Darkfate/Darfate troops::

"Follow me Megaton," said Darkfate "It's time to
FIGHT"

Darkfate left the conference's room and went to Zone 5
where his troops were

--- dcoburn <dcoburn@...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra/Triggerhappy/Skullgrin::
> 
>         Orchestra nods.
> 
>         "Yes!  Let's go to Zone 5!" He said, ready
> to scrap any bot around.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Triggerhappy ran out and got Blowpipe,
> Blowpipe detransformed into Triggerhappy's
> compressed air cannon.  Triggerhappy looked up at
> Menasor.
> 
>          "Yes!  With their gestalt warrior, and
> Beastbox and Squalktalk soon-to-be merging into
> Squalkbox, we will be invincible!!!  Almost...." He
> said.
> 
>          Triggerhappy then noticed another one of
> his allies.  He ran over to Skullgrin.
> 
>           "Hey!!  Hmm, isn't there somebody who can
> transform into a Pretender??" Triggerhappy said,
> trying to hint Skullgrin.  
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Skullgrin nodded.
> 
>        "Hahaha!  I'm surprised I didn't think of
> that!" He exclaimed.
> 
>        Skullgrin transformed to robot mode, then, he
> began a transformation.  He transformed into
> Pretender mode, and had his double slagmaker laser
> ready to be used on something.  In Pretender mode,
> he was 12 feet tall and had brute strength, but his
> intelligence dropped greatly.  He fired 2 rounds
> from his deadly slagmaker(I like calling it the
> slagmaker ok?) at Hot Rod.
>
